about_the_game:
Sacrifice your ears at the altar of Gholoth. A chorus of horrifying instruments has been summoned from the darkest reaches of the abyss - they are eager to exact auditory torture on their doomed victims. Mechano-trombones, glitch-organs, and other abominations await all who dare listen. The original soundtrack for Crawl is composed by Alex Yoder, and includes a bonus track available only on the full album!

Tracks available as 320kbps MP3s
